justification: The reinforcement learning bandit task was used to estimate outcome-irrelevant learning by examining whether the outcome in the first offer affected response key selection in the second offer, indicating value assignment to irrelevant task features.

Working memory capacity was estimated using a well-known change-detection task, where participants had to maintain and retrieve visual information. The detection accuracy was calculated according to K = set_size • (2 • accuracy – 1) for each individual.
